hero.title: Enhance Your Pricing Page to Convert Better
hero.description: Struggling to communicate value on your pricing page? Pricing Flow lets you add smart pricing tooltips using text, images, videos, GIFs, or links—so your users get the clarity they need to take action.

features.title: Powerful Features to Improve Your Pricing Page Strategy
features.description: From global pricing parity to smart content-driven tooltips, Pricing Flow gives you the tools to increase conversions and scale with confidence.

items.title: Interactive Pricing Tooltips
items.description: Add tooltips to any part of your pricing page—explain features, offer comparisons, or share FAQs. Use videos, images, links, or simple text to improve pricing page clarity.

items.title: Pricing Parity for Global Users
items.description: Adapt prices to match local purchasing power. Offer region-specific pricing automatically with our built-in pricing parity engine.

items.title: Sales Analytics (Coming Soon)

items.title: Customizable & No-Code

items.title: Real-Time Updates

items.question: What is Pricing Flow?
items.answer: Pricing Flow is a SaaS tool that enhances pricing pages with interactive tooltips and enables parity pricing, so you can convert better and scale globally.

items.question: Do I need a developer to set this up?
items.answer: Not at all! Pricing Flow is built to be no-code friendly. Anyone can add and manage tooltips using our simple dashboard.

items.question: Can I change tooltip content after publishing?
items.answer: Yes, any changes you make to tooltip content are reflected live instantly.

items.question: How does parity pricing work?
items.answer: You can set different pricing rules based on country or region. It’s perfect for businesses with global audiences.

items.question: When will sales analytics be available?
items.answer: We’re currently building out our analytics feature—coming very soon! Join our waitlist to get early access.
